content.text:
# The Kings of Hong Kong

}}
The Kings of Hong Kong is the second album by 22-Pistepirkko. It was released in 1987 (see 1987 in music).
Track listing
#"I'm Back"
#"Geronimo"
#"Last Night"
#"Big Bed"
#"Hong Kong King"
#"Hank's TV Set"
#"Don't Try to Tease Me"
#"I'm Staying Now"
#"Lost Lost Love"
#"B-Instrumental"
#"Motorcycle Man"
#"Searching & Looking"
#"Horseman's Son"
